name: It Never Ends (itch) (Valeriy Petrov)
description:
"Game design never ends, it just stops" 
(game designer whose name I've forgotten)

Game about iterative process of designing a game, an ultimate unfinished business.

This project was made in Bitsy as part of the 'Unfinished Busines' Bitsy Jam.

I've made this game as part of the Game Design Course that I teach. If you've liked it, please also check works of my students:

Let's make a game, how do we make a game by Hullche (rus)

Epic construction by Mich-hn (rus)

Deja Vu by Kostiantyn Dvornik (eng)

История одной боли by Dahuanna (rus)

P.S.: please share the description of the game that you've created in the comments!
